description: Estuari Gardens is the first phase exclusive residential development within the 394-acre Estuari, featuring a gated serene urban living surrounded by undiluted greenery and complete neighbourhood amenities. Traverse freely within the safely guarded environment of Estuari Gardens, complete with topnotch security features and perimeter fencing designed to provide the residents a peace of mind.
features: 13-acre Designer Crafted Landscape Area With Transplanting Of Mature Trees
